column2: A shop that offers a wide variety of weapons fit for common soldiers and rulers alike.
A shop that offers a wide variety of weapons fit for common soldiers and rulers alike.
A shop that offers a wide variety of weapons fit for common soldiers and rulers alike.
A dealer of special items and sacred staves.
A dealer of special items and sacred staves.
A dealer of special items and sacred staves.
A place of higher learning for those with influence enough to gain admission.
Mages are trained here in the ways of anima magic, using the power of the elements to destroy their enemies.
The knights of Lycia are a core of heavily armored infantry supported by swift cavaliers.
The Wyvern Knights of Bern are heavily armored soldiers who fly into battle on the winged reptiles native to the mountains of Elibe.
Soldiers are trained in both lances and magic at this highly regarded institution.
The warriors of Nabata are known for their tenacity and mobility over all types of terrain.
The feared horse archers of the Sacaean plains are trained here. These highly mobile archers snipe their enemies from horseback.
The Pegasus Knights of Ilia are lance-wielding maidens who ride into battle on nimble winged horses.
Warriors are trained in the traditions of the Western Isles here, providing excellent if somewhat ill-tempered heavy infantry, usually equipped with powerful battle axes.
Soldiers are trained in both coventional weapons and magic at this highly regarded institution.
Agustrian knights keep their swift mounts at these stables.
Silessian knights are trained here in wind magic and pegasus riding.
This school trains warriors in the techniques of Isaachian swordmasters.
Mansterian knights train in riding and lance-wielding here.
Dragon Knights are heavily armed soldiers who fly into battle on the winged reptiles native to the mountains of Thracia.
This institution trains elite cavalry skilled in fighting with the lance from the back of horse and wyvern.
Warriors are trained in the traditions of Verdane here, providing excellent if somewhat ill-tempered heavy infantry, usually equipped with powerful battle axes.
Warriors are trained in the traditions of the Grann legions here, providing excellent if somewhat ill-tempered heavy infantry, usually equipped with powerful battle axes.
